name: Ohana API
description: The open source API directory of community social services.

scripts.postdeploy: sh script/setup_prod_db && bundle exec rake db:seed

ADMIN_SUPPORT_EMAIL.description: The email address that admin interface users should send questions/issues to.

CONFIRMATION_EMAIL.description: The email address that confirmation emails are sent from after user signup.

DEFAULT_PER_PAGE.description: This setting controls how many results you want to the API to return per page by default.

MAX_PER_PAGE.description: This setting controls the maximum amount of results you want to the API to return per page.

EXPIRES_IN.description: This setting defines how long, in minutes, API responses will be cached in Ohana Web Search

SECRET_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.
